attributes.action: Encourage Crosscrounty to use more modern and faster train on then routes between nottingham and birmingham,
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The trains that Arriva Crosscrountry are useing on the routes out of nottingham station are compleatly unsatifactory, with the important link between these's two important cities we should atleast get faster trains and longer  trains as these's services get very Crowded easily which means passengers having to stand for long periods of time so instruct arriva to introduce Voyager trains onto this service or at least better trains
